data.name: Mystwood Manor
data.detailed_description:
In Mystwood Manor you play as a young adult who finds himself in charge of a very old and mysterious hotel, due to some “unexpected” events.

You will hire, train and manage your staff, build new facilities, and upgrade your hotel to meet your customers’ demands.
Each girl on your staff will have her own unique personality and backstory. As you progress each of their storylines you will find out more about them and get to know them inside and out...

Will you be able to unravel the mysteries of Mystwood, while running and growing your hotel business?
Get ready for a new adventure, filled with dark secrets, shocking plot twists and most of all, lots and lots of hot, steamy sex!
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Mystwood Manor is an adult game, in which you play a young man who is in charge of running a hotel full of beautiful women. Experience hours of exciting content, in this adult hotel management game, filled with steamy sex scenes, amusing dialogs and some very unexpected plot twists.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game is intended for ADULTS only and may include explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters showed in the game are all over 18 years old.
